official-title.#text: To revise the boundaries of the Gettysburg National Military Park to include the Gettysburg Train Station and certain land along Plum Run in Cumberland Township, to limit the means by which property within such revised boundaries may be acquired, and for other purposes.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives January 13, 2014.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

quote.#text: An Act to revise the boundary of Gettysburg National Military Park in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: An Act to revise the boundary of Gettysburg National Military Park in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes/s:1
An Act to revise the boundary of Gettysburg National Military Park in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes/s:1/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the park shall include the following, as depicted on the maps titled
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: An Act to revise the boundary of Gettysburg National Military Park in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes/s:1/ss:b

quote.#tail: , numbered 305/80,045, and dated January 2010, if the owner of the property has provided written consent to inclusion:
quote.#text: Gettysburg National Military Park Proposed Boundary Addition

text.#text: In addition to the land identified in subsections

quote.#tail: and its immediate surroundings in the Borough of Gettysburg.

text.#text: The land and interests in land commonly known as the
The land and interests in land located along Plum Run in Cumberland Township.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the acquisition of property within the area described in such paragraph, or the management plan for such acquired property shall be construed to create buffer zones outside of such property. That an activity or use can be seen or heard from within such acquired property shall not preclude the conduct of that activity or use outside such property.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: An Act to revise the boundary of Gettysburg National Military Park in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes/s:1/ss:d

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: An Act to revise the boundary of Gettysburg National Military Park in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes/s:2/ss:a
